name: Strappy Fishnet Lace Push-Up Bra
description: Our #1 push-up gets a sexy makeover with edgy fishnet lace and strappy accents along the cups. Featuring the lift you love and plush padding that’s softer than ever.

name: Rose Embroidery Push-Up Bra
description: Customers love the sexy lift and shape they get from our #1 push-up style. Updated with faux patent leather details and rose & metallic threadwork.

name: Seamless Waffle Bikini Panty
description: Our new, stretchy-smooth fabric molds to your curves for a one-of-a-kind fit.

name: Satin Jacquard and Lace Cami Set
description: A fluttery lace back gives this glossy satin set a feminine edge.

name: Bare Rose Eau de Parfum
description: This bloom becomes you. A floral extension of its original, Bare Rose Eau De Parfum borrows Bare’s blend of proprietary musks to mix with your body chemistry for a unique signature scent.

name: Fuchsia Fantasy Fragrance Lotion
description: A fantastically pink vision where succulent fruit overflows and electric petals buzz through a kaleidoscopic lens. Intensify with matching Fragrance Mist.
